intro.title: Who I Am
intro.description: I am a data enthusiast, constantly learning new knowledge and exploring industry tools to sharpen my skills. Outside of work, I enjoy solo trips that challenge me to step out of my comfort zone, as well as hiking and beginner-level skiing. Sometimes, I like to slow down with a good book‚Äîbalancing curiosity for both data and life..

timeline.title: Business Data Analyst
timeline.description: Analyzed operational and business data to build dashboards and generate insights that improved decision-making and process efficiency.

timeline.title: Data Scientist Intern
timeline.description: Collected and analyzed customer interaction data to identify patterns and support data-driven improvements in sales and communication strategies.

timeline.title: Corporate Account Manager
timeline.description: Managed corporate client portfolios, analyzed financial data, and provided tailored banking solutions while strengthening stakeholder communication and relationship management.

timeline.title: Waitress
timeline.description: Worked as a part-time barista, preparing coffee, fresh juices, and smoothies, while handling orders, serving guests, and maintaining a clean dining area.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Welcome to my project portfolio! Here you‚Äôll find a selection of my work across Azure, DBT, Power BI, and Machine Learning. These projects reflect my passion for data ‚Äî from building scalable pipelines in the cloud, to transforming raw data into reporting-ready models, to creating intuitive dashboards that drive decision-making..

items.title: Azure Data Pipeline
items.description: Built a comprehensive end-to-end data pipeline using Azure Data Factory to process and analyze COVID-19 data. Implemented data ingestion, transformation, and storage solutions with automated monitoring and error handling.

items.title: DBT Analytics Platform
items.description: Developed a robust analytics platform using DBT to transform raw Airbnb data into clean, reusable data marts. Implemented layered modeling architecture with automated testing and documentation.

items.title: Power BI Dashboard
items.description: Created interactive business intelligence dashboards with advanced data visualization techniques. Designed user-friendly interfaces for data exploration and decision-making support.

items.title: ML Sentiment Analysis
items.description: Developed machine learning models for sentiment analysis and stance detection using advanced NLP techniques. Implemented data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation pipelines.
